title: Prayer/Level up table
content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Prayer/Level up table
LevelNew abilities
Each level
  • Increases maximum prayer points, allowing prayers to be used for longer periods of time without the need to restore points.
  • Increases the prayer points restored by Prayer potions and Super restores every 4 levels.
1
  • Activate Thick Skin
2No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
3No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
4
  • Activate Burst of Strength
  • Restore +8 prayer points with Prayer potion (+9 with Super restore)
5No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
6No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
7
  • Activate Clarity of Thought
8
  • Activate Sharp Eye
  • Restore +9 prayer points with Prayer potion (+10 with Super restore)
9
  • Activate Mystic Will
10
  • Activate Rock Skin
  • Wear initiate armour (with 20 and Recruitment Drive completed)
  • Required to complete Medium Falador Diary
11No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
12
  • Restore +10 prayer points with Prayer potion (+11 with Super restore)
13
  • Activate Superhuman Strength
14No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
15No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
16
  • Activate Improved Reflexes
  • Restore +11 prayer points with Prayer potion (+12 with Super restore)
17No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
18No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
19
  • Activate Rapid Restore
20
  • Wear proselyte armour (with 30 and The Slug Menace completed)
  • Wear vestment robe tops
  • Wear vestment robe legs
  • Restore +12 prayer points with Prayer potion (+13 with Super restore)
21No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
22
  • Activate Rapid Heal
  • Wear Void Knight equipment (with 42 , , , , , and )
  • Required to complete Elite Western Provinces Diary
23No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
24
  • Restore +13 prayer points with Prayer potion (+14 with Super restore)
25
  • Activate Protect Item
  • Wield ancient maces (with 15 and partial completion of Another Slice of H.A.M.)
  • Required for Another Slice of H.A.M.
26
  • Activate Hawk Eye
27
  • Activate Mystic Lore
28
  • Activate Steel Skin
  • Restore +14 prayer points with Prayer potion (+15 with Super restore)
29No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
30No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
31
  • Activate Ultimate Strength
  • Enter the Monastery
  • Wear holy sandals
  • Wear holy wraps
  • Required for Scorpion Catcher
32
  • Restore +15 prayer points with Prayer potion (+16 with Super restore)
33No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
34
  • Activate Incredible Reflexes
35No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
36
  • Restore +16 prayer points with Prayer potion (+17 with Super restore)
37
  • Activate Protect from Magic
38No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
39No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
40
  • Activate Protect from Missiles
  • Wear vestment cloaks
  • Wear mitres (with 40 )
  • Purchase and use ectoplasmators
  • Restore +17 prayer points with Prayer potion (+18 with Super restore)
41No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
42
  • Required for Legends' Quest
43
  • Activate Protect from Melee
  • Required for Enakhra's Lament
44
  • Activate Eagle Eye
  • Restore +18 prayer points with Prayer potion (+19 with Super restore)
45
  • Activate Mystic Might
46
  • Activate Retribution
47
  • Required for Rum Deal
48
  • Restore +19 prayer points with Prayer potion (+20 with Super restore)
49
  • Activate Redemption
50
  • Bless holy symbols
  • Bless unholy symbols (with Observatory Quest completed)
  • Use bologa's blessings
  • Required for The Great Brain Robbery
  • Required for Hopespear's Will
51No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
52
  • Activate Smite
  • Required to complete Hard Lumbridge & Draynor Diary
  • Required to complete Hard Varrock Diary
  • Restore +20 prayer points with Prayer potion (+21 with Super restore)
53No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
54
  • Sacrifice Vampyre dust in the Hallowed Sepulchre
55
  • Activate Preserve (after reading a torn prayer scroll)
  • Wield spirit shields (with 45 )
56
  • Restore +21 prayer points with Prayer potion (+22 with Super restore)
57No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
58No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
59No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
60
  • Activate Chivalry (with King's Ransom/Knights Waves Training Grounds completed and 65 )
  • Wear devout boots
  • Wear stoles
  • Wield croziers
  • Wield blessed spirit shields (with 70 )
  • Restore +22 prayer points with Prayer potion (+23 with Super restore)
61No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
62No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
63No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
64
  • Restore +23 prayer points with Prayer potion (+24 with Super restore)
65
  • Wear 3rd age druidic robes (with 65 )
66No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
67No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
68
  • Restore +24 prayer points with Prayer potion (+25 with Super restore)
69No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
70
  • Activate Piety (with King's Ransom/Knights Waves Training Grounds completed and 70 )
  • Use superior dragon bones
  • Purchase and wear soul capes
  • Wear dragonbone necklaces
  • Wear bonecrusher necklaces
  • Wield arcane spirit shields (with 75 and 65 )
  • Wield spectral spirit shields (with 75 and 65 )
  • Required to complete Hard Falador Diary
  • Required to complete Hard Kandarin Diary
  • Required to complete Hard Morytania Diary
71No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
72
  • Restore +25 prayer points with Prayer potion (+26 with Super restore)
73No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
74
  • Activate Rigour (after reading a dexterous prayer scroll and with 70 )
75
  • Wield elysian spirit shields (with 75 )
76
  • Restore +26 prayer points with Prayer potion (+27 with Super restore)
77
  • Activate Augury (after reading an arcane prayer scroll and with 70 )
78No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
79No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
80
  • Restore +27 prayer points with Prayer potion (+28 with Super restore)
81No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
82No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
83No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
84
  • Restore +28 prayer points with Prayer potion (+29 with Super restore)
85
  • Bless spirit shields
  • Required to complete Elite Desert Diary
86No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
87No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
88
  • Restore +29 prayer points with Prayer potion (+30 with Super restore)
89No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
90
  • Add sigils to blessed spirit shields (with 85 )
91No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
92
  • Restore +30 prayer points with Prayer potion (+31 with Super restore)
93No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
94No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
95No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
96
  • Restore +31 prayer points with Prayer potion (+32 with Super restore)
97No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
98No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
99
  • Skill mastery
  • Buy the Prayer cape and hood from the Brother Jered in the Edgeville Monastery, and wear them
v • d • e
Level up tables
Free-to-play
Combat
  • Attack
  • Strength
  • Defence
  • Ranged
  • Prayer
  • Magic
  • Hitpoints
Other
  • Cooking
  • Crafting
  • Firemaking
  • Fishing
  • Mining
  • Runecraft
  • Smithing
  • Woodcutting
Member
  • Agility
  • Construction
  • Farming
  • Fletching
  • Herblore
  • Hunter
  • Slayer
  • Thieving
